sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.8%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 1.2% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading down 0.7%.
JPMorgan Chase is lower by about 1.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading down 0.6%, and Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ), trading up 0.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
